item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (833 points | 211 comments)
2. DuoBook: Generate bilingual stories to learn any language (47 points | 30 comments)
3. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (308 points | 116 comments)
4. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (460 points | 425 comments)
5. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (55 points | 8 comments)
6. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
7. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (222 points | 70 comments)
8. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (43 points | 16 comments)
9. (ab?)using Node module hooks to speed up development (14 points | 3 comments)
10. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (385 points | 294 comments)
11. VVVVVV Source Code (181 points | 23 comments)
12. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (71 points | 28 comments)
13. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (114 points | 69 comments)
14. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (137 points | 89 comments)
15. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (109 points | 12 comments)
16. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (570 points | 515 comments)
17. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (53 points | 7 comments)
18. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (118 points | 65 comments)
19. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (24 points | 8 comments)
20. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (274 points | 241 comments)
21. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (198 points | 105 comments)
22. Jury orders NSO to pay $167M for hacking WhatsApp users (129 points | 38 comments)
23. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (232 points | 74 comments)
24. Sutton and Barto book implementation (53 points | 9 comments)
25. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (100 points | 105 comments)
26. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (98 points | 43 comments)
27. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (87 points | 41 comments)
28. Loving 21st century gaming like an 18th century furniture expert (5 points | discuss)
29. EPA Plans to Shut Down the Energy Star Program (150 points | 105 comments)
30. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (173 points | 23 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
